Posts.Content: licorice2006 wrote: Lost my hairÂ July 07 with a/c. Had two surgeries and have started taxotere Feb 07. Woke up last night with a mouthful of my hair. I am so upset that I have to go thru another summer bald. I live on the Fl gulf coast and was excited that I'd have some hair this year on the beaches. Do I sound petty? I handled it fine last time but I sit here and think "another 6 months" before it grows back. Talk to me and I'll be fine. Chris Dx 6/12/2007, IDC, 2cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Losing hair AGAIN licorice2006 licorice2006
